org.nd4j.linalg.api.ops.executioner

Interface OpExecutioner

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultOpExecutioner, JCudaExecutioner, NativeOpExecutioner

    public interface OpExecutioner
    An operation executioner handles storage specific details of executing an operation
